description: This file is a Python script that interacts with a memory client and an agent to process and respond to user input, demonstrating usage of the MemoryClient, Agent, and OpenAIChat classes.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a language model and maintains context.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from running the agent.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing the OpenAI chat model.

classes.name: MemoryClient
classes.description: Client for managing memory storage and retrieval.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt and returns a RunResponse.

methods.name: client.add
methods.description: Adds messages to the memory store for a specific user.

methods.name: client.get_all
methods.description: Retrieves all memory messages for a specific user.
